channel.title: How do u edit item bonus's?
channel.description:
hey once again i need help
there is a total nooby item i hate...perfect rings...its bonus is to high..i want to keep ring but make it have like 12 bonus how i do that?

item.title: How do u edit item bonus's?
item.dc:creator: @speedhighway speedhighway
item.description:
@speedhighway wrote:

go to item.cfg, search for perfect, find the perfect ring, scroll past the confusing decimal nuimbers to the right until you find some numbers (most likely 0) seperated by tabs. These are the bonuses, the first 5 o’s are attack bonuses, the second 5 are def bonuses, the last 2 are str and prayer (in that order) the snd to last one will be a high number, change it to w/e str bonus you want

Read full topic
item.source: How do u edit item bonus's?
